page.title: 13SCHOOL DAYS
page.content: start school blows at nine fifteen and I go straight to the hall to help set out the chairs for assembly. After registration we have assembly usually until ten a.m. We go back to class and have English until ten forty when it is break time and we go out to play. Break lasts for fifteen minutes when we are brought in by the teacher on duty. We continue with English for another half hour and then change to maths. At twelve fifteen the morning session ends. When it is our classes turn we go in for dinner. Some people have a packed lunch which they bring from home, some, who live near enough, go home for lunch. For school dinners we normally have chips and other fast foods. After food we go back out to play until afternoon school starts at one fifteen p.m.
